# Packages

```{r, message=F, warnign=F}
library(rio)
library(tidyverse)
library(clarify)
```



## Load data
```{r}
df <- import("risk_states1.csv")
```


## Estimate Model

```{r}

m1 <- glm(Policy~ poptotal+ nbrs_lag +, data=df, family=binomial)
```
